K

KeyInput - Class in cs151Project.controllers
Handles the keyboard interactions between the user and the movements/animations of the game character.
KeyInput() - Constructor for class cs151Project.controllers.KeyInput
 
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class cs151Project.controllers.KeyInput
This function handles the response when one of the movement keys is pressed.
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class cs151Project.controllers.KeyInput
This function handles the response when one of the movement keys is released.
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class cs151Project.controllers.KeyInput
Although not being used by this program, this function handles a response when an event key is typed.
kirby - Variable in class cs151Project.models.KirbySpriteSheet
File array containing original image files for Kirby's character.
kirby - Static variable in class cs151Project.views.Game
This Sprite object is initialized with the Kirby information.
Kirby - Class in cs151Project.models
An object of the Kirby class declares and stores the information needed to program a Kirby playable character into the game.
Kirby(int, int, int, int, boolean, Id, Handler) - Constructor for class cs151Project.models.Kirby
An object of the Kirby class contains several attributes that correspond to the character's current status.
kirbySheet - Variable in class cs151Project.models.Sprite
This object is populated with all the Kirby image files that have already been converted to BufferedImage files.
kirbySheet - Static variable in class cs151Project.views.Game
This object carries the image information for Kirby.
KirbySpriteSheet - Class in cs151Project.models
An object of KirbySprite has access to the image files that all correspond to the Kirby character (entity).
KirbySpriteSheet() - Constructor for class cs151Project.models.KirbySpriteSheet
Once initialized the BufferedImage array is populated with converted image files.
ks - Static variable in class cs151Project.views.Game
This array contains all the BufferedImages for Kirby.
